snippet.title: Star Battle for the Bally Astrocade
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Star Battle is a 3D shoot'em-up, for 1 or 2 players.

You fly through a tunnel, shooting down a hostile pilot.


The game is obviously inspired by the trench run from Star Wars.

What I think:

It is a big mess...you will just shoot and move around like crazy, while you hope to hit the TIE-Fighter.
